narrative.narrative: Air Hong Kong is a cargo airline which is majority owned by Cathay Pacific since June 1994. It has also been owned 40% by DHL since 2002. It was founded in 1986 and began flying in February 1988 with a 707-320C doing cargo charter to Bombay,Britain and Nepal. Scheduled service started in October 1989 and soon they had two 707's. March 1993 they had two 747-100's and a 707. They were the launch customer for the A300-600F. In 2010 they didn't serve anyplace outside Asia as they once did, but they still served 12 destinations in 9 countries, the most being three in Japan. The fleet as of 2014 was eight A300-600F's and three 747-400F's. They have had a few 747-200F's also.
